headline: How BofA’s Upgrade and New Tech Initiatives Will Impact Comcast (CMCSA) Investors
summary: Earlier this month, BofA upgraded Comcast, arguing the company is well placed to benefit as the media and cable industry undergoes major structural change across content, technology, and live experiences. At the same time, Comcast is expanding multi-gigabit broadband in Maryland and rolling out new political streaming ad tools, underlining how it is leaning into both connectivity and advanced media monetization. We’ll now examine how BofA’s upgrade, framed around industry transformation,...

headline: Reliable, High-Speed Internet from Xfinity Now Available in Northeast Madison County, Mississippi
summary: HUNTSVILLE, Ala., January 13, 2026--Comcast has completed a major network expansion to connect thousands of homes and businesses in northeast Madison County, Mississippi to reliable, high-speed, symmetrical Internet from America’s smartest and most reliable converged network. For the first time, residents and businesses can access Xfinity Internet, mobile, entertainment, and security services – all in one simple, seamless solution – delivering more speed, savings, and control over their connecte
